vpc_name.description: Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) name. This template uses a newly created VPC and the VPC name must be unique. Value range: 1 to 57 characters, including letters, digits, underscores (_), hyphens (-), and periods (.). Default value: build-a-personal-website-based-on-wordpress_demo

secgroup_name.description: Security group name. This template uses a newly created security group. For details about how to set security group rules, see the deployment guide. The value can contain 1 to 64 characters, including letters, digits, underscores (_), hyphens (-), and periods (.). Default value: build-a-personal-website-based-on-wordpress_demo

eip_traffic_size.description: EIP bandwidth size. This template uses an EIP billed by traffic. Value range: 1 to 300 Mbit/s. Default value: 300 Mbit/s

ecs_name.description: ECS name, which must be unique. The naming format is {ecs_name}_ecs. The value can contain 1 to 60 characters, including letters, digits, underscores (_), hyphens (-), and periods (.). Default value: build-a-personal-website-based-on-wordpress_demo

ecs_flavor.description: ECS flavor. For details, see the deployment guide. Default value: s7n.medium.4 (s7n|1vCPUs|4GiB)

ecs_password.description: ECS initial password. After an ECS is created, log in to the ECS console and change the password by referring to the deployment guide. The password can contain 8 to 26 characters, including at least three types of the following characters: uppercase letters, lowercase letters, digits, and special characters (!@$%^-_=+[{}]:,./?), and it cannot contain any username or the username spelled backwards. The administrator is root.

system_disk_size.description: System disk size, in GiB. Value range: 40 to 1024. The system disk size cannot be scaled down. Default value: 40

data_disk_size.description: Data disk size, in GiB. Value range: 10 to 32768. Default value: 250

charging_mode.description: ECS billing mode. By default, expenses are automatically deducted. The value can be prePaid (yearly/monthly) or postPaid (pay-per-use). Default value: prePaid

charging_unit.description: Unit of a subscription period. This parameter is mandatory when the charging_mode is set to prePaid (yearly/monthly). Value range: month and year. Default value: month

charging_period.description: Subscription period. This parameter is mandatory when the charging_mode is set to prePaid (yearly/monthly). If charging_unit is set to month, the value ranges from 1 to 9. If charging_unit is set to year, the value ranges from 1 to 3. Default value: 1

mysql_password.description: Initial password of MySQL root user. After a MySQL database is created, you can change its password by referring to the deployment guide. The password can contain 8 to 12 characters, including uppercase letters, lowercase letters, digits, and special characters (@%^-=).

database_username.description: Username of the MySQL database. The username can contain 8 to 16 characters, which can be all letters or a combination of letters and digits. Default value: wordpressuser

database_password.description: Password of the MySQL database user. After a MySQL database is created, you can change its password by referring to the deployment guide. The password can include 8 to 12 characters and can contain uppercase letters, lowercase letters, digits, and special characters(@%^-=).

allow_ping.description: Allows to test the ECS connectivity with the ping command.

allow_ssh_linux.description: Allows remote access to Linux ECSs using SSH.

allow_all.description: Network port of the WordPress site

Login.value: After this solution is successfully deployed, it takes about 20 to 30 minutes to run the stript (affected by network fluctuation). Enter http://${huaweicloud_vpc_eip.myeip.address}/wordpress in the address bar to access the website.
